name: Modern Pink Elf RPG
description:
A simple, unpretentious, event based eroge RPG with no combat and a beautiful, sexually curious female protagonist. You play as Cleome, a hot, single elf from a fictional fantasy world. Cleome get teleported to a fictional modern age world. Cleome needs a large sum of money to return back to her world. And how does an elf from a different world make money in an eroge?

By investing into her education and then smartly investing with the money she makes with good career choices.

NO, she has lots of wanton sex, you silly goose.

Featuring over 50 unique CGs, 14 Live2D animations and developed by the talented Sensouya-san, and localized into English and Chinese by our friends at Cursed Atelier, we bring you Modern Pink Elf RPG! An eroge you can finish in a day, or take your time in multiple sessions. Featuring a standard gallery room for all the many, many scenes you'll unlock, this is an eroge for when you don't need your eroges to be any more than a simple eroge featuring a pink haired elf having lots of sex. No worlds to save, no tear jerking trauma to uncover, no empires to overthrow, no gods to slay. I came for the elf, and I stayed until I came.

Playtime
Around 8+ hours to complete all endings and scenes.
Less if you just use CTRL to skip through most of the text.

Controls
Can be played with keyboard only, gamepad only, or keyboard + mouse.

Note
Modern Pink Elf RPG is made with RPG Maker MV, which isn’t known to work well with older computers or laptops.
Please close your browser and other extra running programs before playing Modern Pink Elf RPG.

Disclaimer
All characters involved in any sexual act in Modern Pink Elf RPG are over 20 years old.
